item.title: ğŸŒ•ğŸ„ Moone Update 2022 - The Docker Compose v2 Update (Part I) | Changes
item.author: Niklas Meyer
item.description: Moohoo everybody! Today we have put together a big fat update package for you again, which besides general container updates brings one big change: Docker Compose v2 support!!! But let’s start with the small stuff first: Minor changes ClamAV is now using version 0.105 (the latest at release time). Postfix has been updated to version 3.5.6. netfilter, acme, dockerapi, olefy, watchdog, unbound and phpfpm have been updated to Alpine Linux 3.
